LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.0.label: moderate expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.0.description: This place isn't quite rich. I can't expect to be totally pampered.
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.1.label: low expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.1.description: This place doesn't have the wealth for many luxuries. I need to keep myself strong.
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.2.label: very low expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.2.description: This place is poverty-stricken. I can't expect any comfort here; I need to keep myself strong.
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.3.label: extremely low expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.3.description: I'm out here with little to no shelter. I'd better steel myself to survive.
LanguageData.EnvironmentDark.stages.0.label: in darkness
LanguageData.EnvironmentDark.stages.0.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I don't like it.
LanguageData.CabinFever.stages.0.label: cabin fever (mild)
LanguageData.CabinFever.stages.0.description: I've been cooped up inside for days. I need to get outside.
LanguageData.CabinFever.stages.1.label: cabin fever (serious)
LanguageData.CabinFever.stages.1.description: I've been trapped like a rat in here for so long. I desperately need to get outside!
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.0.label: wearing worn-out apparel
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.0.description: My outfit is looking pretty bad. Can't I get something decent to wear?
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.1.label: wearing tattered apparel
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.1.description: I'm wearing a tattered piece of trash. Can't I get something decent to wear?
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.0.label: dead man's {0}
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.0.description: I am wearing apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.1.label: dead man's {0} (+1)
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.1.description: I am wearing two pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.2.label: dead man's {0} (+2)
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.2.description: I am wearing three pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.3.label: dead man's {0} etc
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.3.description: I am wearing more than three pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.0.label: human leather {0}
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.0.descript: Wearing human leather is disturbing. Who could do this?
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.1.label: human leather {0} (+1)
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.1.descript: I'm dressed like an insane person.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.2.label: human leather {0} (+2)
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.2.descript: I think there may be a face on my clothes. Oh, no, my clothes *are* a face.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.3.label: human leather {0} etc
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.3.descript: I look like a freak from a horror show, and I feel like I'm in a horror show.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.0.label: human leather {0}
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.0.descri: I enjoy wearing the suffering of others.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.1.label: human leather {0} (+1)
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.1.descri: This will scare them. All will know my power.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.2.label: human leather {0} (+2)
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.2.descri: The faces on my clothes aren't smiling, but they make *me* happy.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.3.label: human leather {0} etc
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.3.descri: The flesh! The flesh signals my triumph!
LanguageData.Sick.stages.0.label: sick
LanguageData.Sick.stages.0.description: I don't feel very well, I'm sick.
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.0.label: cold
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.1.label: very cold
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.1.description: I'm so cold. Shivering. Can't get warm.
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.2.label: freezing
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.2.description: My teeth are chatting so hard I can barely speak. My toes are numb. I need to get warm.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.0.label: hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.0.description: This heat is unpleasant. I'm sweating.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.1.label: very hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.2.label: extremely hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.2.description: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.3.label: burning up
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.3.description: I'm burning up. I think I could die from this heat!
